channel.title: Home on Outcome documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Outcome documentation

item.title: iostream support
item.description: Header file iostream_support.hpp #define OUTCOME_IOSTREAM_SUPPORT_HPP namespace outcome_v2_1737b49b { template <class R, class S, class P> std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& s, result<R, S, P>& v); template <class R, class S, class P> std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& s, const result<R, S, P>& v); template <class R, class S, class P> std::string print(const result<R, S, P>& v); template <class R, class S, class P, class N> std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& s, outcome<R, S, P, N>& v); template <class R, class S, class P, class N> std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& s, const outcome<R, S, P, N>& v); template <class R, class S, class P, class N> std::string print(const outcome<R, S, P, N>& v); } Input operator outcome_v2_1737b49b::operator>> template <class R, class S, class P> std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& s, result<R, S, P>& v); Deserialise a result

item.title: Acknowledgements
item.description: github contributors .ghContributors{ display:flex; flex-flow: wrap; align-content: flex-start } .ghContributors div{ width: 50% ; display: inline-flex; margin-bottom: 5px; } .ghContributors div label{ padding-left: 4px ; } .ghContributors div span{ font-size: x-small; padding-left: 4px ; } @ned14 522 commits @akrzemi1 1 commits @jenkins-nedprod 1 commits This pretty, modern C++ documentation Hugo - static website generator of this documentation. hugo-theme-docdock - the Hugo theme used by this documentation.

item.title: Try operations
item.description: Header file try.hpp #define OUTCOME_TRY_HPP #define OUTCOME_TRY_GLUE2(x, y) #define OUTCOME_TRY_GLUE(x, y) #define OUTCOME_TRY_UNIQUE_NAME #define OUTCOME_TRYV2(unique, m) #define OUTCOME_TRY2(unique, v, m) #define OUTCOME_TRYV(m) #define OUTCOME_TRYX(m) #define OUTCOME_TRY(v, m) namespace outcome_v2_1737b49b { template <class T> typename T::template rebind<void> try_operation_return_as(T&& v); } Macro OUTCOME_TRYV #define OUTCOME_TRYV(m) If the outcome returned by expression m is not valued, propagate any failure by immediately returning that failure state immediately Macro OUTCOME_TRYX #define OUTCOME_TRYX(m) If the outcome returned by expression m is not valued, propagate any failure by immediately returning that failure state immediately, else become the unwrapped value as an expression.

item.title: outcome<R, S, P>
item.description: Header file outcome.hpp #define OUTCOME_OUTCOME_HPP namespace outcome_v2_1737b49b { class bad_outcome_access; namespace trait { template <class P> struct is_exception_ptr; } struct no_payload_type; struct no_exception_type; namespace impl { template <class Base, class R, class S, class P, class NoValuePolicy> class outcome_payload_observers; template <class Base, class R, class S, class NoValuePolicy> class outcome_payload_observers<Base, R, S, void, NoValuePolicy>; template <class Base, class R, class S, class P, class NoValuePolicy> class outcome_exception_observers; template <class Base, class R, class S, class NoValuePolicy> class outcome_exception_observers<Base, R, S, void, NoValuePolicy>; template <class Base, class R, class S, class P, class NoValuePolicy> class outcome_failure_observers; template <class Base, class R, class NoValuePolicy> class outcome_failure_observers<Base, R, std::error_code, std::exception_ptr, NoValuePolicy>; } namespace policy { template <class R, class S, class P> using default_outcome_policy = std::conditional_t<//detail::is_same_or_constructible<std::error_code, S>&&trait::is_exception_ptr<P>::value, error_code_throw_as_system_error_exception_rethrow<R, S, P>, //terminate//>; } template <class T, class U> constexpr void hook_outcome_construction(in_place_type_t<T>, U*) noexcept; template <class T, class U> constexpr void hook_outcome_copy_construction(in_place_type_t<T>, U*) noexcept; template <class T, class U> constexpr void hook_outcome_move_construction(in_place_type_t<T>, U*) noexcept; template <class T, class U> constexpr void hook_outcome_in_place_construction(in_place_type_t<T>, U*) noexcept; template <class R, class S = std::error_code, class P = std::exception_ptr, class NoValuePolicy = policy::default_outcome_policy<R, S, P>> class outcome; template <class T, class U, class V, class R, class S, class P, class N> constexpr )//>bool operator==(const result<T, U, V>& a, const outcome<R, S, P, N>& b) noexcept(//noexcept(std::declval<outcome<R, S, P, N>>()==std::declval<result<T, U, V>>())); template <class T, class U, class V, class R, class S, class P, class N> constexpr )//>bool operator!

item.title: result<R, S>
item.description: Header file result.hpp #define OUTCOME_RESULT_HPP #define OUTCOME_ENABLE_POSITIVE_STATUS namespace outcome_v2_1737b49b { class bad_result_access; struct no_value_type; struct no_error_type; namespace impl { template <class R, class EC, class NoValuePolicy> class result_storage; template <class Base, class R, class NoValuePolicy> class result_value_observers; template <class Base, class NoValuePolicy> class result_value_observers<Base, void, NoValuePolicy>; template <class Base, class EC, class NoValuePolicy> class result_error_observers; template <class Base, class NoValuePolicy> class result_error_observers<Base, void, NoValuePolicy>; template <class R, class EC, class NoValuePolicy> using select_result_impl = result_error_observers<result_value_observers<result_storage<R, EC, NoValuePolicy>, R, NoValuePolicy>, EC, NoValuePolicy>; template <class R, class S, class NoValuePolicy> class result_final; } namespace policy { template <class EC> struct throw_directly; template <class EC> struct error_code_throw_as_system_error; template <class EC> struct exception_ptr_rethrow; struct terminate; template <class EC> using default_result_policy = std::conditional_t<//std::is_void<EC>::value, //terminate, //std::conditional_t<//detail::is_same_or_constructible<std::error_code, EC>, error_code_throw_as_system_error<EC>, //std::conditional_t<//detail::is_same_or_constructible<std::exception_ptr, EC>, exception_ptr_rethrow<EC>, //throw_directly<EC>//>>>; } template <class T, class U> constexpr void hook_result_construction(in_place_type_t<T>, U*) noexcept; template <class T, class U> constexpr void hook_result_copy_construction(in_place_type_t<T>, U*) noexcept; template <class T, class U> constexpr void hook_result_move_construction(in_place_type_t<T>, U*) noexcept; template <class T, class U> constexpr void hook_result_in_place_construction(in_place_type_t<T>, U*) noexcept; template <class R, class S = std::error_code, class NoValuePolicy = policy::default_result_policy<S> class result; template <class R, class S, class P> void swap(result<R, S, P>& a, result<R, S, P>& b) noexcept(noexcept(a.
